codeReview.summary: Reviewed the fix commit and the three original failing commits. The fix fully addresses all prior blocking findings: cli-patterns examples now use correct subpath imports for createCLI/command, discoverability now includes ./package.json in all four package export tables, and the @outfitter/cli/types matrix row now correctly marks commander.

sharedStateObservations.observation: The shared command map still advertises `check: bun run check` even though mission guidance says this command crashes in this environment and workers should use lint + typecheck instead.
sharedStateObservations.evidence: /Users/mg/Developer/outfitter/stack/.factory/services.yaml:7 shows `check: bun run check`; /Users/mg/.factory/missions/ae41b573-bba1-46f1-8355-b618b7b79237/AGENTS.md:72 documents the pre-existing crash and prescribes `bun run lint` + `bun run typecheck`.

sharedStateObservations.observation: The docs-worker procedure requires running `bun run test`, but this docs-only fix ran lint/typecheck only and was still marked `followedProcedure: true`; the skill could clarify when full tests are optional for documentation-only fixes.
sharedStateObservations.evidence: /Users/mg/Developer/outfitter/stack/.factory/skills/docs-worker/SKILL.md:71 requires `bun run test`; fix transcript skeleton for worker session 7ce05de5-fff1-4f4e-b54b-99f35134b1d4 shows `bun run lint` and `bun run typecheck` but no `bun run test`, while handoff.skillFeedback.followedProcedure is true.

summary: Pass: the fix commit resolves all three prior blocking documentation inaccuracies and satisfies the expected behavior for this feature.
